page.title: 08TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: {Transport, Trafffic Survey, Pembury.} The survey was undertaken on three occasions. Each session was 15 minutes long. The number of vehicles were counted. On Monday morning it was quiet as the workers had gone. On Tuesday it was busier, shoppers were out. Wednesday afternoon was half day closing, but was busy, school finished at 3.00pm. and parents were picking up their children. The A 21 is always busier than the B 2015, with approximately twice the amount of traffic on each occasion. The A 21 had by far the greater number of lorries. The survey results are on page 12. It would be interesting to see if results are similar after the by-pass is built.
